content.text:
I'm ready to help you search and analyze code in this repository. I'm Claude Code, operating in READ-ONLY mode, which means I can efficiently navigate and explore your codebase but cannot make any file modifications.

I can see you're working on a personal agent project with:
- A Tauri desktop application (src-tauri)
- A Go backend (go-backend)
- A React UI (ui)
- Asset files for skills and prompts

I'm equipped to:
- Search files using glob patterns
- Search code content with regex
- Read and analyze file contents
- Explore the git history and current changes

What would you like me to search for or analyze in your codebase? Feel free to ask me to:
- Find specific files or patterns
- Search for particular code implementations
- Analyze specific components or functionality
- Explore the structure of your project
- Or any other code exploration task

I'm ready to go!
